img.title: Home – Manoogian
img.rs-layer: We promote & take pride in education that we offer in

div.p: The Armenian General Benevolent Union (A.G.B.U.) Alex & Marie Manoogian School is a nonprofit, coeducational school dedicated to giving students the opportunity to acquire the knowledge and skills that will make them well-rounded contributors to American society, while at the same time preserving their rich Armenian heritage.

h3.span: Create your free account now and get immediate access to 100s of online courses.

hr.h3: Donate to AGBU Alex and Marie Manoogian School

U.S. News and World Report Names the AGBU Alex and Marie Manoogian School one of the Country's Best High Schools of 2019
Keep checking this section for school news and announcements.
